com.gussssy.gametwo.engine.audio

Class NotifyingSoundClip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gussssy.gametwo.engine.audio.SoundClip
      • com.gussssy.gametwo.engine.audio.NotifyingSoundClip

  • public class NotifyingSoundClip
extends SoundClip
    An extension of SoundClip. Havent done anything just planning some more features lacking in SoundClip without breaking the games sounds [PLANNED] Adds the ability to send a notification to an object when the sound has finished playing. [PLANNED] Counts the time the sound hhas been playing so that whgen its getting close to finishing it can fade out
